33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Bakr As-Siddiq said:"The Messenger of Allah(s.a.w) narrated to us, saying: 'The Dajjal shall emerge from a land in the east called Khurasan. He is followed by a people whom appear as if their f aces are shields coated with leather

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ مِنْ أَيْنَ يَخْرُجُ الدَّجَّالُ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Where The Dajjal Comes From
